CountryCodeRuleWrapper - Interface in uk.pallas.systems.typr.entities.v1.validation.multi
Some field definitions are country specific for example a postal code within the UK is difined differently to a zip code in the United States but both are used within the same area of an address block

EnumValidationRule - Interface in uk.pallas.systems.typr.entities.v1.validation

I

isValid(Number) - Method in interface uk.pallas.systems.typr.entities.v1.validation.number.NumberValidationRule
This will compare the incoming object and see if it is a valid whole number and if the value is a valid number do we have a maximum or a minimum data range? If there is a upper or lower value (they can be null) then it tests the supplied object is less than/equal or greater than/equal as appropriate.
isValid(Object) - Method in interface uk.pallas.systems.typr.entities.v1.FieldDefinition
Is the supplied test object something that matches against our field definition regular expression? If validation optional is set to true this will return true, if the supplied object is null, this will always return false.
isValid(Object) - Method in interface uk.pallas.systems.typr.entities.v1.validation.multi.RuleWrapper
Is the supplied test object something that matches against our field definition regular expression? If validation optional is set to true this will return true, if the supplied object is null, this will always return false.
isValid(Object) - Method in interface uk.pallas.systems.typr.entities.v1.validation.ValidationRule

isValid(String) - Method in interface uk.pallas.systems.typr.entities.v1.validation.StringValidationRule
Is the supplied test object something that matches against our field definition regular expression? If validation optional is set to true this will return true, if the supplied object is null, this will always return false.

L

LongValidationRule - Interface in uk.pallas.systems.typr.entities.v1.validation.number
This is used for whole integer numbers when used in fields and allows us to validate that they are within an acceptable range.
